definition: surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: A new ultraviolet spectrophotometric method is proposed for the determination of N-benzylglycine ethyl ester.
sentences.chinese: 建立测定苄基甘氨酸乙酯的紫外分光光度法。

sentences.english: This effect is related to the con- centration of glycine and culture duration.
sentences.chinese: 并发现此作用与甘氨酸的浓度及培养时间有关。

sentences.english: Glycine betaine is a very effective osmotic regulator.
sentences.chinese: 甘氨酸甜菜碱是一种非常有效的渗透调节剂。

sentences.english: Pro-Gly was least effective in this respect.
sentences.chinese: 脯氨酸甘氨酸在这方面作用较低。

sentences.english: With the reaction temperature, glycine copper micro-tubes become larger then the diameter.
sentences.chinese: 随着反应温度的升高，甘氨酸铜微管的管径随之变大。

sentences.english: The accumulation of glycine betaine in E.

sentences.english: Glycine (Gly) induced an outward current which was completely abolished by strychnine.
sentences.chinese: 甘氨酸激发的外向电流可被士的宁完全阻断。

sentences.english: Investigation and application of amino acid chelated iron;

sentences.english: The thermodynamic functions of the reaction of glycine with pyridoxal were measured and discussed.
sentences.chinese: 测算和讨论了甘氨酸和吡哆醛结合反应的热力学函数。

sentences.english: The physicochemical characteristics of ferrous glycinate were evaluated by a storage test.
sentences.chinese: 通过贮藏试验，研究了甘氨酸螯合铁的理化性质。

sentences.english: They were using X-ray absorption spectroscopy toinvestigate the amino acid glycine.
sentences.chinese: 他们用X射线的吸收光谱研究甘氨酸。
